layout.singingstanza: I am my be -- lov -- ed's, and his de -- sir -- e is for me. Come, my be -- lov -- ed, let us go forth in -- to the fields; Let us lodge in the vil -- lag -- es. Let us rise up ear -- ly for the vine -- yards; let us see if the vine has bud -- ded, if the blos -- som is o -- pen, if the pom -- e -- gra -- nates are in bloom; there I will give you my love.

lyrics.stanza: I am my beloved's, And his desire is for me.
